about_the_game:
It's time to Return to Paradise!

Encounter hundreds of species, new and old, as you turn your garden into a piñata paradise! Return to Paradise is a fan-made spiritual successor to the Viva Piñata series owned by Microsoft. We hope to expand on these past titles with our own cast of piñatas, characters, story, and mechanics!

The Gardens
You start on a small plot of land, with only a shovel, watering can, and packet of grass to your name. Using these tools, you can terraform this small garden into a haven for various piñata species! Once you've gotten your footing on the land, you can dive underwater to explore a whole second world of unknown piñatas just waiting to be discovered! Just watch out for the sour piñatas...

The Piñatas
As you change your gardens, you'll discover many kinds of curious piñatas. Each species has its interests, likes, dislikes, and enemies! By catering to one piñata's requirements, you may get it to pay a visit! If the piñata enjoys its time in your garden, it might even decide to call it home and take on its new colorful form!

It's time to Return to Paradise!

Encounter hundreds of species, new and old, as you turn your garden into a piñata paradise! Return to Paradise is a fan-made spiritual successor to the Viva Piñata series owned by Microsoft. We hope to expand on these past titles with our own cast of piñatas, characters, story, and mechanics!

You start on a small plot of land, with only a shovel, watering can, and packet of grass to your name. Using these tools, you can terraform this small garden into a haven for various piñata species! Once you've gotten your footing on the land, you can dive underwater to explore a whole second world of unknown piñatas just waiting to be discovered! Just watch out for the sour piñatas...

The Piñatas
As you change your gardens, you'll discover many kinds of curious piñatas. Each species has its interests, likes, dislikes, and enemies! By catering to one piñata's requirements, you may get it to pay a visit! If the piñata enjoys its time in your garden, it might even decide to call it home and take on its new colorful form!
legal_notice:
Return To Paradise was created under Microsoft's "Game Content Usage Rules" using intellectual assets from Viva Piñata. Return to Paradise is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft. All assets found in Return to Paradise have been created by its community, and no tools have been used to rip, modify, or reverse engineer Microsoft-owned content for this game.

The Microsoft Game Content Usage Rules can be found here. https://www.xbox.com/en-US/developers/rules
name: Return to Paradise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Up on the land, down in the sea! Discover hundreds of piñata species, new and old, in Return to Paradise, a Viva Piñata fangame! Return to Paradise is a dream fangame being built by the community, for the community!
